message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Your offer was quite bold, Alice. I'm willing to give you a better deal than the inevitable losses from future rounds, but I need a bigger piece of the pie.

Bob, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking, and inflation is eating away at our potential gains. I'm proposing a 52/48 split in my favor - a compromise that benefits us both more than dragging this out further.
